00023 #ifndef _RAWTILE_H
00024 #define _RAWTILE_H
00025 
00026 #include <cstring>
00027 #include <string>
00028 #include <cstdlib>
00029 
00030 #ifndef HAVE_TIME_H
00031 typedef unsigned long int time_t;
00032 #endif
00033 
00035 enum ColourSpaces { GREYSCALE, sRGB, CIELAB };
00036 
00038 enum CompressionType { UNCOMPRESSED, JPEG, DEFLATE };
00039 
00040 
00041 
00043 
00044 class RawTile{
00045 
00046  public:
00047 
00049   int tileNum;
00050 
00052   int resolution;
00053 
00055   int hSequence;
00056 
00058   int vSequence;
00059 
00061   CompressionType compressionType;
00062 
00064   int quality;
00065 
00067   std::string filename;
00068 
00070   time_t timestamp;
00071 
00072 
00073  public:
00074 
00075 
00077   void *data;
00078 
00081 
00082   int memoryManaged;
00083 
00085   int dataLength;
00086 
00088   unsigned int width;
00089 
00091   unsigned int height;
00092 
00094   int channels;
00095 
00097   int bpc;
00098 
00100   bool padded;
00101 
00102 
00104 
00113   RawTile( int tn = 0, int res = 0, int hs = 0, int vs = 0,
00114            int w = 0, int h = 0, int c = 0, int b = 0 ) {
00115     width = w; height = h; bpc = b; dataLength = 0; data = NULL;
00116     tileNum = tn; resolution = res; hSequence = hs ; vSequence = vs;
00117     memoryManaged = 1; channels = c; compressionType = UNCOMPRESSED; quality = 0;
00118     timestamp = 0; padded = 0;
00119   };
00120 
00121 
00123   ~RawTile() {
00124     if( data && memoryManaged ){
00125       if(bpc==16) delete[] (unsigned short*) data;
00126       else delete[] (unsigned char*) data;
00127     }
00128   }
00129 
00130 
00132   RawTile( const RawTile& tile ) {
00133 
00134     dataLength = tile.dataLength;
00135     width = tile.width;
00136     height = tile.height;
00137     channels = tile.channels;
00138     bpc = tile.bpc;
00139     tileNum = tile.tileNum;
00140     resolution = tile.resolution;
00141     hSequence = tile.hSequence;
00142     vSequence = tile.vSequence;
00143     compressionType = tile.compressionType;
00144     quality = tile.quality;
00145     filename = tile.filename;
00146     timestamp = tile.timestamp;
00147     padded = tile.padded;
00148 
00149     if( bpc == 16 ) data = new unsigned short[dataLength/2];
00150     else data = new unsigned char[dataLength];
00151 
00152     if( data && (dataLength > 0) && tile.data ){
00153       memcpy( data, tile.data, dataLength );
00154       memoryManaged = 1;
00155     }
00156   }
00157 
00158 
00160   RawTile& operator= ( const RawTile& tile ) {
00161 
00162     dataLength = tile.dataLength;
00163     width = tile.width;
00164     height = tile.height;
00165     channels = tile.channels;
00166     bpc = tile.bpc;
00167     tileNum = tile.tileNum;
00168     resolution = tile.resolution;
00169     hSequence = tile.hSequence;
00170     vSequence = tile.vSequence;
00171     compressionType = tile.compressionType;
00172     quality = tile.quality;
00173     filename = tile.filename;
00174     timestamp = tile.timestamp;
00175     padded = tile.padded;
00176 
00177     if( bpc == 16 ) data = new unsigned short[dataLength/2];
00178     else data = new unsigned char[dataLength];
00179 
00180     if( data && (dataLength > 0) && tile.data ){
00181       memcpy( data, tile.data, dataLength );
00182       memoryManaged = 1;
00183     }
00184 
00185     return *this;
00186   }
00187 
00188 
00190   int size() { return dataLength; }
00191 
00192 
00194   friend int operator == ( const RawTile& A, const RawTile& B ) {
00195     if( (A.tileNum == B.tileNum) &&
00196         (A.resolution == B.resolution) &&
00197         (A.hSequence == B.hSequence) &&
00198         (A.vSequence == B.vSequence) &&
00199         (A.compressionType == B.compressionType) &&
00200         (A.quality == B.quality) &&
00201         (A.filename == B.filename) ){
00202       return( 1 );
00203     }
00204     else return( 0 );
00205   }
00206 
00207 
00209   friend int operator != ( const RawTile& A, const RawTile& B ) {
00210     if( (A.tileNum == B.tileNum) &&
00211         (A.resolution == B.resolution) &&
00212         (A.hSequence == B.hSequence) &&
00213         (A.vSequence == B.vSequence) &&
00214         (A.compressionType == B.compressionType) &&
00215         (A.quality == B.quality) &&
00216         (A.filename == B.filename) ){
00217       return( 0 );
00218     }
00219     else return( 1 );
00220   }
00221 
00222 
00223 };
